name: interfaces
desc: Enforced interfaces for all aspects of Mappa Operis.

name: PhaseInterface
desc: A group of tasks that are related, i.e. Phases.

name: addSubTask
desc: Add a sub-task to the phase.

name: delayedTasks
desc: Tasks that are behind schedule (un-started beyond start date).

name: firstTask
desc: The task that starts first.

name: incompleteTasks
desc: Tasks that are incomplete (past, present, and future).

name: lastTask
desc: The task that ends last.

name: overdueTasks
desc: Tasks that are behind schedule (ongoing past due date).

name: todaysTasks
desc: Task that should be work on today.

name: ProjectInterface
desc: Projects Interface â€” Identical to PhaseInterface but with different return types.

name: addSubTask
desc: Add a sub-task to the phase.

name: delayedTasks
desc: Tasks that are behind schedule (un-started beyond start date).

name: firstTask
desc: The task that starts first.

name: incompleteTasks
desc: Tasks that are incomplete (past, present, and future).

name: lastTask
desc: The task that ends last.

name: overdueTasks
desc: Tasks that are behind schedule (ongoing past due date).

name: todaysTasks
desc: Task that should be work on today.

name: TaskInterface
desc: A task that can be scheduled and tracked.

name: addCompletedWorkHours
desc: Update the amount of work completed. (Add's to the current amount).

name: setAssignedBufferInDaysTo
desc: Update the buffer days of the task.

name: setStartDateTo
desc: Update the start date of the task.

name: setTotalDurationInDaysTo
desc: Update the total duration of the task.

name: setTotalWorkHoursTo
desc: Update the total amount of work required.

name: WorkUnit
desc: The fundamental details any implementation any Piece of Work should have.

name: addPredecessor
desc: Add predecessor to the task.

name: addSuccessor
desc: Add successor to the task.

name: assignedBufferInDays
desc:
The number of additional days assigned as a buffer period. (is considered part of the task
duration, and is not considered while calculating inherentBufferInDays or isCritical).

name: canStart
desc: Whether the task can start.

name: completedDurationInDays
desc: The number of scheduled working days completed.

name: completedWorkInHours
desc: The amount of work that has been completed.

name: description
desc: Explanation/Details of the task.

name: earliestStartDateAmongSuccessors
desc: Earliest start date among successors. endDate if no successors.

name: endDate
desc:
The date the task is expected to end to be completed on time. (includes
assignedBufferInDays).

name: id
desc: A unique identifier for the task.

name: inherentBufferInDays
desc:
The number of days that the task can be delayed without delaying the project by virtue of its
dependencies and dependents.

name: isCompleted
desc: Whether the task is completed.

name: isCritical
desc: Whether the task is critical (any delay to task will delay the project).

name: isDelayed
desc: Whether the task is delayed (un-started past start date).

name: isOngoing
desc: Whether the task is ongoing.

name: isOverdue
desc: Whether the task is overdue (ongoing past completion date).

name: latestEndDateAmongPredecessors
desc: Latest end date among predecessors. startDate if no predecessors.

name: predecessors
desc: Tasks that have to be completed before this task can start.

name: remainingDurationInDays
desc: The number of scheduled working days remaining.

name: remainingWorkInHours
desc: The amount of work that has not been completed.

name: removePredecessor
desc: Remove predecessor from the task.

name: removeSuccessor
desc: Remove successor from the task.

name: setAssignedBufferInDaysTo
desc: Update the buffer days of the task.

name: setDescriptionTo
desc: Update the description of the task.

name: setTitleTo
desc: Update the title of the task.

name: startDate
desc: The date the task is expected to start to be completed on time.

name: successors
desc: Tasks that can only start after this task is completed.

name: title
desc: A non-unique identifier for the task.

name: totalBufferInDays
desc: Total buffer time available.

name: totalDurationInDays
desc: Working Days.

name: totalWorkInHours
desc: Working Hours.

name: units
desc: Concrete implementation of various work units.

name: Phase
desc: A task that can be scheduled and tracked.

name: Phase.create
desc: Create a new task that starts today (local time-zone).

name: addPredecessor
desc: Add predecessor to the task.

desc: Add a sub-task to the phase.
